business_summary: Ina Pfeiffer Hundeschule is a professional dog training school located in Stolberg. They offer a variety of services including individual and group lessons, puppy training, city/street training, behavior assessment, and advice before dog adoption. The school is overseen by the Office for Consumer Protection, Animal Protection, and Veterinary Affairs.
mitHunden is a dog school located in Aachen, Germany. They offer a variety of services including dog training and dog daycare. The school operates from Monday to Friday between 07:00 and 17:00.
